content: a doily or centerpiece with a pineapple design which can be made easily and quickly it makes a great housewarming gift too made in the colors you love this is an advanced beginner pattern with simple stitches depending on your thread it will be 17 or 18 or even 19 inches across round 29 beg shell * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 3 times 2 loops shell in shell chain 2 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet shell in next chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 3 times chain 2 shell in shell repeat from * around join 8 double_crochet in center circle =1 across
